item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: Access
item.content:encoded: Welcome to Punte Sites. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: Access
item.content:encoded:
PEACE OF MIND

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo. PARTICIPATE

ABOUT AMIE

Through the BeTop Yoga System you will learn the science and essence of Yoga, understanding and integrate the yoga practices to help you align the four aspects of being human.

For those who set aside their fears and live in the field of potential and possibility. At Yogi, we do not only teach yoga, we seek to create a yoga community.

Facebook

Twitter

Instagram

AMAZING FEATURES

THE SAUNA BATH

Through the BeTop Yoga System you will learn the science and essence of Yoga, understanding and

THE STONEHEDGE

Through the BeTop Yoga System you will learn the science and essence of Yoga, understanding and

THE FRAGNANCE

Through the BeTop Yoga System you will learn the science and essence of Yoga, understanding and

SERVICES & PRICING

HAND & FEET​

Perspiciatis, unde omnis iste natus sit voluptatem

40$

BODY WRAPS

Sed ut perspiciatis, unde omnis iste natus error

35$

REINVIGORATE MIND

quae ab illo inventore veritatis et quasi architecto

25$

NUTRATION & MEDITATION

Sed ut perspiciatis, unde omnis iste natus error

15$

SECOND SKIN FACIAL

Sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium

45$

RELAXING HERBAL BATH

Unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem

35$

OUR HAPPY TEAM

Rachel Jennifer

Bignners Yoga Instructor

Lora Atkinson

Intermediate Yoga Instructor

Amadi Benizer

Bignners Yoga Instructor

OUR HAPPY Clients

Through long, flowing strokes + a mix of rm and gentle pressure, you’ll experience lymphatic drainage, detoxification, and pure relaxation, consider this of sleep in massage form!

Lora Atkinson

CALL FOR APPOINTMENT
